GROUND_TRUTH: What is your role in the company?
On a scale of 1 to 10, how satisfied are you with the existing feedback mechanisms in the company? (1 being very dissatisfied, 10 being very satisfied)
How often do you receive feedback from your manager/supervisor regarding your performance?
Do you feel comfortable providing feedback to your manager/supervisor?
Do you think that the feedback processes is transparent?
In your opinion, how can the company encourage more open and constructive feedback among employees?
